# Bedfordshire Historical Record Society

The Bedfordshire Historical Record Society is an historical society and text publication society for the county of Bedfordshire in England. It was established in 1912.
Selected publications
*A Bedfordshire bibliography: with some comments and biographical notes by L. R. Conisbee and A. R. Threadgill (1962â€“1978). [http://www.bedfordshirehrs.org.uk/wp-content/uploads/2017/09/A_Bedfordshire_Bibliography_1967_Supplement_compressed.pdf 1967 Supplement], [http://www.bedfordshirehrs.org.uk/wp-content/uploads/2017/09/A_Bedfordshire_Bibliography_Second_Supplement_compressed.pdf Second Supplement], [http://www.bedfordshirehrs.org.uk/wp-content/uploads/2017/09/A_Bedfordshire_Bibliography_Third_Supplement_compressed.pdf Third Supplement].
See also
* Bedfordshire and Luton Archives and Records Service
